name: Pawn
description:
Pared down and minimized, the shapes in Pawn were borrowed from the timeless front line pieces of a chess game.

17”x17” zippered pillow cover of 100% Cotton Poplin printed in North Carolina and fabricated in the USA with non-sweatshop labor. Polyester fiber insert with recycled content. Hand stuffed corners. 

PLEASE NOTE: All pillows are fabricated upon order. It takes a little longer, but you get a product made just for you. Please allow 3-5 weeks for order completion. We will communicate about order status as it is processed. All shipping is insured and trackable.
